articles.author: Laura Kayali
articles.title: Macron to China: Keep North Korea out of Ukraine war or risk NATO coming to Asia - politico.eu
articles.description: French president delivers veiled warning to Beijing during speech in Singapore.
articles.content:
"I had objected to NATO having a role in Asia because I dont believe in being enrolled in someone elses strategic rivalry," Macron said, hinting that Paris could revisit its stance.
